trans-unit.source: Grant access to your Push Certificate to Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Grant access to your Push Certificate to Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: To allow Mobile Engagement to send Push Notifications on your behalf, you need to grant it access to your certificate.
trans-unit.target: To allow Mobile Engagement to send Push Notifications on your behalf, you need to grant it access to your certificate.

trans-unit.source: This is done by configuring and entering your certificate into the Mobile Engagement portal.
trans-unit.target: This is done by configuring and entering your certificate into the Mobile Engagement portal.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you obtain your .p12 certificate as explained in [Apple's documentation](https://developer.apple.com/library/prerelease/ios/documentation/IDEs/Conceptual/AppDistributionGuide/AddingCapabilities/AddingCapabilities.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40012582-CH26-SW6)
trans-unit.target: Make sure you obtain your .p12 certificate as explained in [Apple's documentation](https://developer.apple.com/library/prerelease/ios/documentation/IDEs/Conceptual/AppDistributionGuide/AddingCapabilities/AddingCapabilities.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40012582-CH26-SW6)

trans-unit.source: Navigate to your Mobile Engagement portal.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to your Mobile Engagement portal.

trans-unit.source: Ensure you're in the correct and then click on the **Engage** button at the bottom:
trans-unit.target: Ensure you're in the correct and then click on the **Engage** button at the bottom:

trans-unit.source: Click on the **Settings** page in your Engagement Portal.
trans-unit.target: Click on the **Settings** page in your Engagement Portal.

trans-unit.source: From there click on the **Native Push** section to upload your p12 certificate:
trans-unit.target: From there click on the **Native Push** section to upload your p12 certificate:

trans-unit.source: Select your p12, upload it and type your password:
trans-unit.target: Select your p12, upload it and type your password:

trans-unit.source: Send a notification to your app
trans-unit.target: Send a notification to your app

trans-unit.source: We will now create a simple Push Notification campaign that will send a push to our app:
trans-unit.target: We will now create a simple Push Notification campaign that will send a push to our app:

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the **Reach** tab in your Mobile Engagement portal.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the **Reach** tab in your Mobile Engagement portal.

trans-unit.source: Click **New Announcement** to create your push campaign
trans-unit.target: Click **New Announcement** to create your push campaign

trans-unit.source: Setup the first fields of your campaign:
trans-unit.target: Setup the first fields of your campaign:

trans-unit.source: Provide a **Name** for your campaign
trans-unit.target: Provide a **Name** for your campaign

trans-unit.source: Select the **Delivery time** as **Out of app only**: this is the simple Apple push notification type that features some text.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Delivery time** as **Out of app only**: this is the simple Apple push notification type that features some text.

trans-unit.source: In the notification text, type first the **Title** which will be the first line in the push.
trans-unit.target: In the notification text, type first the **Title** which will be the first line in the push.

trans-unit.source: Then type your **Message** which will be the second line
trans-unit.target: Then type your **Message** which will be the second line

trans-unit.source: Scroll down, and in the content section select **Notification only**
trans-unit.target: Scroll down, and in the content section select **Notification only**

trans-unit.source: You're done setting the most basic campaign.
trans-unit.target: You're done setting the most basic campaign.

trans-unit.source: Now scroll down and click on **Create** button to save your push notification campaign.
trans-unit.target: Now scroll down and click on **Create** button to save your push notification campaign.

trans-unit.source: Finally - click on **Activate** to send push notification.
trans-unit.target: Finally - click on **Activate** to send push notification.

trans-unit.source: You will be able receive the notification on your iOS device in the notification center like the following:
trans-unit.target: You will be able receive the notification on your iOS device in the notification center like the following:

trans-unit.source: If you have an Apple Watch paired with this iOS device then you will see the notification on your Apple Watch:
trans-unit.target: If you have an Apple Watch paired with this iOS device then you will see the notification on your Apple Watch:
